title: Who is the first Korean band to get Grammy awards? - Quora

response.answer_text: No one. BTS was the first korean boy group to get a grammy nomination for “best recording package” and were the first to perform on a grammy stage without any nomination. But, the first ever korean artist to receive a grammy award is Sumi Jo  She is a 57 year old, Coloratura soprano south korean singer that received a grammy award for “best opera recording” in the year 1995. She has been nominated three times and won once. The below is the link to the grammys official page. You can find more there. Sumi Jo
